document.full_text: yahoo inc said it has made significant progress in resolving a dispute over the online payments unit of alibaba group, a chinese internet search company whose founder took control of the prized business.
document.title: yahoo says makes headway in alibaba talks
lines_and_colors: yahoo inc said it has made significant progress in resolving a dispute over the online payments unit of alibaba group, a chinese internet search company whose founder took control of the prized business.
